alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 05 at 10:16AM EST until further notice by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids MI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Michigan... Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. .The combination of rain and melting snow into Wednesday may lead to flooding along the Maple River near Maple Rapids. For the Maple River...including Maple Rapids...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Maple River at Maple Rapids. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of County Line Road and a home along County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Maple River Maple Rapid 9.0 8.2 Sun 9 am EST 8.5 9.2 9.5 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
